short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SaveIT - Application Tracker is a tool to manage university, internship, or job applications easily with no login required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether for university, internships, jobs, or any other opportunities. Say goodbye to tedious spreadsheets and scattered notes—SaveIT keeps all your application details secure within your browser as it stores your data in your own browsers storage.

How It Works ？
✴ Home Page: Start a new application or view your saved ones.
✴ New Application: Click "New Application" to add details like the URL, title, date, and status.
✴ Manage Applications: SaveIT checks for duplicates and lets you update the status, like "Selected" or "Rejected."
✴ View Applications: See all your saved applications with their dates and status in one place.

Key Features ⚿:
1. Easy Tracking: Keep track of all your applications, like for jobs or university, in one simple place.
2. Fully Private: Your data stays safe in your browser—no outside storage or security worries.
3. Automatic URL Capture: SaveIT grabs the application URL automatically and helps you fill in details quickly.
4. Update Status Easily: Change the status of your applications with simple options like “Selected,” “Rejected,” “No Response,” and “Interviewed.”
5. User-Friendly Interface: View, add, and manage your applications with a simple, easy-to-use design.
